means: 附子之类（毒草），舟形乌头

sentence.Network_en: Professor Snape : What is the difference between monkshood and wolfsbane?
sentence.Network_cn: 斯内普教授: 那附子和牛扁有什么不同?

sentence.Network_en: Also known as monkshood or aconite.
At last the king got initiated into Jain monkshood together with his sons.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后,国王与他的儿子们皈依了耆那教.

means.word_mean: 1. a poisonous herb native to northern Europe having hooded blue-purple flowers; the dried leaves and roots yield aconite
